description: Product of first n palindromic primes minus 1.
comments: The subsequence which are themselves primes begins: 5, 29, 2309, 4615105109, 2518373770712229494528309. - _Jonathan Vos Post_, Feb 09 2011
author: _Felice Russo_
extensions: Corrected and extended by Larry Reeves (larryr(AT)acm.org), Sep 25 2000
